name: Football Director 2019
description: Football Director lets you choose from over 200 teams from 20 Leagues across Europe. Compete in your domestic league all the way through to the European main stage. Customise you teams training schedule, tactics and formation to be the best in the League. Can you handle the pressure of being the best manager in Europe?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 64-bit or 32-bit Processor: Intel Pentium 4 3Ghz+ Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
